displayName: Kube State - Prometheus - Pod Disruption Budget Exceeded

documentation.content: When the pod disruption budget is exceeded, the configured minimum availability is not being respected, typically due to an application failure.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch prometheus_target
| { metric
      prometheus.googleapis.com/kube_poddisruptionbudget_status_current_healthy/gauge
  ; metric
      prometheus.googleapis.com/kube_poddisruptionbudget_status_desired_healthy/gauge }
| outer_join 0
| sub
| every 5m
| window 5m
| condition val() < 0
